00025 #include <aeryn/minimal_report.hpp>

00031 namespace Aeryn

00033         namespace

00036                 const std::string separator = std::string( 60, '-' );   
00037         }

00040         MinimalReport::MinimalReport

00042                 std::ostream& out /* = std::err */

00046         }

00049         void MinimalReport::BeginTesting
00050         ( 
00051                 const std::string& header,
00052                 unsigned long 
00053         )
00054         {
00055                 out_ << header;         
00056         }

00083         void MinimalReport::Failure
00084         ( 
00085                 const std::string& testName,
00086                 const TestFailure& failure
00087         )
00088         {
00089                 WriteTestDetails( testName );   
00090                 out_ << FormatFailure< COMPILER >::Out( failure );
00091         }
00092 
00094         void MinimalReport::MissingTest
00095         (  
00096                 const std::string& testName,
00097                 const TestMissing& missingTest 
00098         )
00099         {
00100                 WriteTestDetails( testName );
00101 
00102                 out_ << FormatFailure< COMPILER >::Out( missingTest.Description(), 
00103                                                                                                 missingTest.Line(), 
00104                                                                                                 missingTest.File().c_str() );
00105         }
00106 
00108         void MinimalReport::Error
00109         ( 
00110                 const std::string& testName,
00111                 const std::string& errorDetails 
00112         )
00113         {
00114                 WriteTestDetails( testName );
00115 
00116                 out_ << "Error\t: " << errorDetails << "\n";
00117                 out_ << "\n";   
00118         }

00137         void MinimalReport::EndTesting
00138         (
00139                 unsigned long testCount, 
00140                 unsigned long failureCount,
00141                 unsigned long missingCount
00142         )
00143         {
00144                 out_ << separator << "\n\n";
00145 
00146                 out_ << "Ran " << testCount << " test";
00147                 if ( testCount != 1 )
00148                 {
00149                         out_ << "s";
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 out_ << ", ";
00153                 out_ << testCount - failureCount - missingCount << " Passed, ";
00154                 out_ << failureCount << " Failed";
00155 
00156                 if ( missingCount > 0)
00157                 {
00158                         out_ << ", " << missingCount << " Missing";
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 out_ << ".\n\n";
00162         }
00163 
00165         void MinimalReport::WriteTestDetails
00166         ( 
00167                 const std::string& testName 
00168         )
00169         {
00170                 out_ << separator << "\n";
00171                 out_ << "\n";
00172                 
00173                 if ( !testName.empty() )
00174                 {
00175                         out_ << "Test\t: " << testName << "\n";
00176                         out_ << "\n";   
00177                 }
00178         }
